page.title: 03PLAYGROUND GAMES 1
page.content: {Bulldog}is a favourite game of mine. A group of people stay in the semi-circle and one person stays outside the semi-circle that is marked on our playground. The person outside is said to be "on" and he has to call a person's name out and this person has to try and run to a semi-circle marked at the other end of the playground. If he is caught he is on with the first person to be on. The game ends when everyone is caught. {Elastic}is a game the girls play. We use a piece of elastic that is about two metres in length and joined together to make it rectangular in shape when two girls put it around their legs. The girl whose turn it is jumps on it and makes all sorts of difficult and easy moves. Matthew Holt and Faye Cutler
